title: Ma's macadamia salad
description: This is a great winter salad for freshening up your diet - crisp veg and crunchy nuts, lightly dressed with vinaigrette.This meal is low calorie  and provides 321 kcal, 4g protein, 16g carbohydrate (of which 14g sugars), 27g fat (of which 4g saturates), 5g fibre and 0.3g salt per portion.
ingredients: 2 red onions, halved, cut into wedges
2 red peppers, seeded, cut into chunks
2 chicory heads, hearts removed, coarsely chopped
1 tart green apple (such as Braeburn or Granny Smith) peeled, chopped
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
